pullRequest.title: RDM-7423 RDM-7424: Test BEFTA FW update
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR is to demonstrate the changes in PR hmcts/befta-fw#14
JIRA link (if applicable)

RDM-7423
RDM-7424

Change description
This PR is to test the PR hmcts/befta-fw#14 by running the local functional tests against the following release tag:- 1.0.22.RDM-7423-7424
The tests in feature file F-026 have been updated to simulate the DSL changes covered by RDM-7423 and RDM-7424.
Does this PR introduce a breaking change? (check one with "x")
[ ] Yes
[X] No

commit.message:
RDM-7423 RDM-7424: Test BEFTA FW update

This commit is to test the PR hmcts/ccd-api-test-automation-fw#14 by
running the local functional tests against the following release tag:-
hmcts/ccd-api-test-automation-fw/releases/tag/1.0.22.RDM-7423-7424

The tests in feature file `F-026` have been updated to simulate the DSL
changes covered by RDM-7423 and RDM-7424. see:

 * [RDM-7423](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-7423)
 * [RDM-7424](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-7424)

Revert "Sonar exclude BEFTA resources directory"

This reverts commit 2d74613e

RDM-7423 RDM-7424: Test BEFTA FW update

This commit is to test the PR hmcts/ccd-api-test-automation-fw#14 by
running the local functional tests against the following release tag:-
hmcts/ccd-api-test-automation-fw/releases/tag/1.0.22.RDM-7423-7424.2

The tests in feature file `F-026` have been updated to simulate the DSL
changes covered by RDM-7423 and RDM-7424. see:

 * [RDM-7423](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-7423)
 * [RDM-7424](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-7424)
fix test data for environment-specific availability of the header

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -2,46 +2,46 @@
 Feature: F-026: Get case data with UI layout
 
   Background: Load test data for the scenario
-    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source
+    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source.
 
   @S-078
-  Scenario: must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Comma] must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs

nodes.bodyText: Full stop at end of this line to more nicely exemplify how this would be used.

nodes.bodyText: , at end of all lines except the last one, and . at end of the very last line in the paragraph.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -2,46 +2,46 @@
 Feature: F-026: Get case data with UI layout
 
   Background: Load test data for the scenario
-    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source
+    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source.
 
   @S-078
-  Scenario: must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Comma] must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
+    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD],
+    When a request is prepared with appropriate values,
+    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store],
+    Then a positive response is received,
+    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK],
+    And the response has all other details as expected,
 
   @S-077
-  Scenario: must return an empty SearchResultView envelope and status code 200 if case type has no associated cases
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And the request [uses an existing case-type which doesn't have any associated cases]
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains an empty SearchResultView, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Full Stop] must return an empty SearchResultView envelope and status code 200 if case type has no associated cases
+    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD].
+    When a request is prepared with appropriate values.
+    And the request [uses an existing case-type which doesn't have any associated cases].
+    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store].
+    Then a positive response is received.
+    And the response [contains an empty SearchResultView, along with an HTTP-200 OK].
+    And the response has all other details as expected.

@@ -2,46 +2,46 @@
 Feature: F-026: Get case data with UI layout
 
   Background: Load test data for the scenario
-    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source
+    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source.
 
   @S-078
-  Scenario: must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Comma] must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
+    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD],
+    When a request is prepared with appropriate values,
+    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store],
+    Then a positive response is received,
+    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK],
+    And the response has all other details as expected,
 
   @S-077
-  Scenario: must return an empty SearchResultView envelope and status code 200 if case type has no associated cases
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And the request [uses an existing case-type which doesn't have any associated cases]
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains an empty SearchResultView, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Full Stop] must return an empty SearchResultView envelope and status code 200 if case type has no associated cases
+    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD].
+    When a request is prepared with appropriate values.
+    And the request [uses an existing case-type which doesn't have any associated cases].
+    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store].
+    Then a positive response is received.
+    And the response [contains an empty SearchResultView, along with an HTTP-200 OK].
+    And the response has all other details as expected.
 
   @S-074
-  Scenario: must return appropriate negative response when request does not provide valid authentication credentials
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And the request [does not provide valid authentication credentials]
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a negative response is received
-    And the response [has an HTTP-403 return code]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7424: Extra Space] must return appropriate negative response when request does not provide valid authentication credentials

@@ -2,46 +2,46 @@
 Feature: F-026: Get case data with UI layout
 
   Background: Load test data for the scenario
-    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source
+    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source.
 
   @S-078
-  Scenario: must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Comma] must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
+    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD],
+    When a request is prepared with appropriate values,
+    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store],
+    Then a positive response is received,
+    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK],
+    And the response has all other details as expected,
 
   @S-077
-  Scenario: must return an empty SearchResultView envelope and status code 200 if case type has no associated cases
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And the request [uses an existing case-type which doesn't have any associated cases]
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains an empty SearchResultView, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Full Stop] must return an empty SearchResultView envelope and status code 200 if case type has no associated cases
+    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD].
+    When a request is prepared with appropriate values.
+    And the request [uses an existing case-type which doesn't have any associated cases].
+    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store].
+    Then a positive response is received.
+    And the response [contains an empty SearchResultView, along with an HTTP-200 OK].
+    And the response has all other details as expected.
 
   @S-074
-  Scenario: must return appropriate negative response when request does not provide valid authentication credentials
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And the request [does not provide valid authentication credentials]
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a negative response is received
-    And the response [has an HTTP-403 return code]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7424: Extra Space] must return appropriate negative response when request does not provide valid authentication credentials
+    Given  a  user  with  [an active profile in CCD]
+    When   a   request   is   prepared   with   appropriate   values
+    And    the request [does not provide valid authentication credentials]  
+    And    it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]  
+    Then   a  negative  response  is  received 
+    And    the   response   [has an HTTP-403 return code]  
+    And    the    response    has    all    other    details    as    expected   
 
   @S-075
-  Scenario: must return 403 when request provides authentic credentials without authorised access to the operation
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And the request [does not provide authorised access to the operation]
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a negative response is received
-    And the response [has an HTTP-403 return code]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [BOTH RDM-7423 and RDM-7424]  must return 403 when request provides authentic credentials without authorised access to the operation

@@ -2,46 +2,46 @@
 Feature: F-026: Get case data with UI layout
 
   Background: Load test data for the scenario
-    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source
+    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source.
 
   @S-078
-  Scenario: must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Comma] must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
+    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD],
+    When a request is prepared with appropriate values,
+    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store],
+    Then a positive response is received,
+    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK],
+    And the response has all other details as expected,
 
   @S-077
-  Scenario: must return an empty SearchResultView envelope and status code 200 if case type has no associated cases
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And the request [uses an existing case-type which doesn't have any associated cases]
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains an empty SearchResultView, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Full Stop] must return an empty SearchResultView envelope and status code 200 if case type has no associated cases

nodes.bodyText: full stop at end of the very last line of the scenario, please.

   Background: Load test data for the scenario
-    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source
+    Given an appropriate test context as detailed in the test data source.
 
   @S-078
-  Scenario: must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Comma] must return the list of cases and status code 200 for correct inputs
+    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD],
+    When a request is prepared with appropriate values,
+    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store],
+    Then a positive response is received,
+    And the response [contains details of existing cases associated, along with an HTTP-200 OK],
+    And the response has all other details as expected,
 
   @S-077
-  Scenario: must return an empty SearchResultView envelope and status code 200 if case type has no associated cases
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And the request [uses an existing case-type which doesn't have any associated cases]
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a positive response is received
-    And the response [contains an empty SearchResultView, along with an HTTP-200 OK]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7423: Optional Full Stop] must return an empty SearchResultView envelope and status code 200 if case type has no associated cases
+    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD].
+    When a request is prepared with appropriate values.
+    And the request [uses an existing case-type which doesn't have any associated cases].
+    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store].
+    Then a positive response is received.
+    And the response [contains an empty SearchResultView, along with an HTTP-200 OK].
+    And the response has all other details as expected.
 
   @S-074
-  Scenario: must return appropriate negative response when request does not provide valid authentication credentials
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And the request [does not provide valid authentication credentials]
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a negative response is received
-    And the response [has an HTTP-403 return code]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [RDM-7424: Extra Space] must return appropriate negative response when request does not provide valid authentication credentials
+    Given  a  user  with  [an active profile in CCD]
+    When   a   request   is   prepared   with   appropriate   values
+    And    the request [does not provide valid authentication credentials]  
+    And    it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]  
+    Then   a  negative  response  is  received 
+    And    the   response   [has an HTTP-403 return code]  
+    And    the    response    has    all    other    details    as    expected   
 
   @S-075
-  Scenario: must return 403 when request provides authentic credentials without authorised access to the operation
-    Given a user with [an active profile in CCD]
-    When a request is prepared with appropriate values
-    And the request [does not provide authorised access to the operation]
-    And it is submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout] operation of [CCD Data Store]
-    Then a negative response is received
-    And the response [has an HTTP-403 return code]
-    And the response has all other details as expected
+  Scenario: [BOTH RDM-7423 and RDM-7424]  must return 403 when request provides authentic credentials without authorised access to the operation
+    Given  a    user with [an active profile in CCD].
+    When   a request    is prepared with appropriate values,
+    And    the request    [does not provide authorised access to the operation].
+    And    it is    submitted to call the [Get case data with UI layout]   operation   of   [CCD Data Store],
+    Then   a negative    response is received.
+    And    the response    [has an HTTP-403 return code],
+    And    the    response    has    all    other   details    as    expected.

commit.message: use the latest release containing syntactic flexibilities

Merge branch 'RDM-7583' into RDM-7423-7424_Test_BEFTA_FW_update

Conflicts:
	build.gradle

Merge branch 'RDM-7423-7424_Test_BEFTA_FW_update' of
git@github.com:hmcts/ccd-data-store-api.git into
RDM-7423-7424_Test_BEFTA_FW_update

Conflicts:
	src/aat/resources/features/F-026/S-078.td.json

RDM-7423 RDM-7424: code review changes for PR #805
